name: Blood Bank Managemenet System
desc: The Blood Bank Management System (BBMS) is a web-based application that helps blood banks to manage their operations more efficiently. The system is developed using Java, MySQL, JSP, Bootstrap, and HTML.

name: Lung Cancer Detection with SVM Algorithm
desc: This project is a machine learning application that uses the support vector machine (SVM) algorithm to detect lung cancer in chest X-rays. The application is developed using Python and Tkinter, a graphical user interface (GUI) library.

name: Online Live Chatting System
desc: This chat system is a great way for people to connect with each other and communicate in real time. It is also a great way for businesses to provide customer support or to connect with their customers.
